"},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー！　耳元で変なこと言うなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Ah! Don’t say weird things right next to my ear!”"},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすくす、いいんだよー、素直になってもー。","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hehe, it’s okay, just be honest.”"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほら、体がどんどん敏感になっていってるよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"See, your body is becoming more and more sensitive.”"},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あふんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Ahhn!”"},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、変なとこ触んなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hey, don’t touch weird places!”"},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みみみ、ミルちゃんーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“M-M-Mil-chan!?”"},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よ、ようやく……","translatedEnglishLine":"“F-Finally...”"},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"　薬の効果が収まった」","translatedEnglishLine":"The effect of the medicine has worn off.”"},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちぇーっ、","translatedEnglishLine":"“Tch, ”"},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにもしないなんてつまらないのー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Doing nothing is so boring!”"},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……ミルちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Ugh... Mil-chan...”"},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、薬師が三人で集まってなんの話だ？","translatedEnglishLine":"“Oh, what are the three pharmacists talking about?”"},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エロい話か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it an erotic story?”"},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"“........”"},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"“........”"},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ……","translatedEnglishLine":"“Th-”"},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エロい話だよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s an erotic story.”"},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“What!?”"},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また三人で薬作ろうねー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Let’s make medicine together again, the three of us!”"},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、それは……","translatedEnglishLine":"“Ugh, that is...”"},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶対に嫌だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Absolutely not!”"},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおー！　なにしとったんじゃー！？","translatedEnglishLine":"“Whoa! What were you doing!?”"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気になるーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m curious---!”"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、プリマがいたか。","translatedEnglishLine":"“Oh, Prima is here.”"},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　丁度良かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just perfect.”"},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょっと、なに、","translatedEnglishLine":"“W-Wait, what, ”"},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人の部屋に勝手に入って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Entering someone’s room without permission...”"},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――って、あっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Wait, ah.”"},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐう、ぐう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Snore, snore...”"},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、廊下の真ん中にぶっ倒れて、","translatedEnglishLine":"“Honestly, collapsing right in the middle of the hallway,”"},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぐうすか眠ってたぞ、こいつ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sleeping soundly like this him?”"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普段なら放置だが……","translatedEnglishLine":"“Usually I’d leave him be, but...”"},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この城も男が増えたし、","translatedEnglishLine":"There are more men in this castle are...”"},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“??”"},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、よく考えると」","translatedEnglishLine":"“But now that I think about it,”"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“What?”"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、メガデスの相手だけでなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"“Well, not only dealing with Megadeth,”"},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"　セスナの面倒も見たりと、","translatedEnglishLine":"But also taking care of Setsuna,”"},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　プリマも大変だなぁと」","translatedEnglishLine":"Prima has it tough too.”"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hmmmm...”"},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、大したことないよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"“Well, it’s not a big deal.”"},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一緒に暮らしたこともあったけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"We used to live together,”},{"    },{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その時も別に苦労なんてなかったし","translatedEnglishLine":"And even then, I didn’t have any troubles.”},{"    },{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、一緒に暮らしてたのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Hmm, you lived together?”"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「短い間だけどね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Only for a short time though...”"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その節はお世話に……なりました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"“Thank you for taking care of me at that time…”"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うずうずー、むずむずーって……
「だー！　耳元で変なこと言うなー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Ah! Don’t say weird things right next to my ear!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすくす、いいんだよー、素直になってもー。
ほら、体がどんどん敏感になっていってるよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See, your body is becoming more and more sensitive.”
The effect of the medicine has worn off.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにもしないなんてつまらないのー」
「お、薬師が三人で集まってなんの話だ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Oh, what are the three pharmacists talking about?”
“Let’s make medicine together again, the three of us!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおー！　なにしとったんじゃー！？
人の部屋に勝手に入って……」
「まったく、廊下の真ん中にぶっ倒れて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Honestly, collapsing right in the middle of the hallway,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐうすか眠ってたぞ、こいつ」
「それでわざわざ運んでくれたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “So you went out of your way to carry him?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この城も男が増えたし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are more men in this castle now,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かに犯されでもしたらかなわん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it wouldn’t be good if someone assaulted him.”
“...Though I think the only one who’d do such a thing,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたくらいだと思うけど」
セスナに代わって礼を言うよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll thank you on behalf of Setsuna.”
“But now that I think about it,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、メガデスの相手だけでなく、
セスナの面倒も見たりと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But also taking care of Setsuna,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリマも大変だなぁと」
一緒に暮らしたこともあったけど、
その時も別に苦労なんてなかったし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even then, I didn’t have any troubles.”},{

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その節はお世話に……なりました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Thank you for taking care of me at that time…”

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うずうずー、むずむずーって……
「だー！　耳元で変なこと言うなー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Ah! Don’t say weird things right next to my ear!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすくす、いいんだよー、素直になってもー。
ほら、体がどんどん敏感になっていってるよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See, your body is becoming more and more sensitive.”
The effect of the medicine has worn off.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにもしないなんてつまらないのー」
「お、薬師が三人で集まってなんの話だ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Oh, what are the three pharmacists talking about?”
“Let’s make medicine together again, the three of us!”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおー！　なにしとったんじゃー！？
人の部屋に勝手に入って……」
「まったく、廊下の真ん中にぶっ倒れて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Honestly, collapsing right in the middle of the hallway,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐうすか眠ってたぞ、こいつ」
「それでわざわざ運んでくれたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “So you went out of your way to carry him?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この城も男が増えたし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are more men in this castle now,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かに犯されでもしたらかなわん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it wouldn’t be good if someone assaulted him.”
“...Though I think the only one who’d do such a thing,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたくらいだと思うけど」
セスナに代わって礼を言うよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll thank you on behalf of Setsuna.”
“But now that I think about it,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、メガデスの相手だけでなく、
セスナの面倒も見たりと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But also taking care of Setsuna,”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリマも大変だなぁと」
一緒に暮らしたこともあったけど、
その時も別に苦労なんてなかったし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even then, I didn’t have any troubles.”},{

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その節はお世話に……なりました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “Thank you for taking care of me at that time…”
